casebody.data:
PENNSYLVANIA CEMENT COMPANY, Plaintiff, v. BRADLEY CONTRACTING COMPANY, Defendant, and Ernest C. Moore, Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 20, 1925.) No. 8. Wood, Cooke & Seitz, of New York City (Howard O. Wood, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Leo Oppenheimer, of New York City, for defendant appellee.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed. A rearguiment of this ease was granted, and at its conclusion the order was again affirmed.
